attributes.action: let students retake the cambridge igcse english as a first language may 3rd 2016
attributes.additional_details: exam should be ignored and cambridge should make a new exam that is not on a university level but on a year 11 students level 15 and 16 year old are not able to work through an exam this hard this exam should be considered as a mock and students should be able to retake the exam by the end of this school year.
attributes.background: let the students who took the cambridge igcse english as a first language may 3rd 2016 retake the exam as the exam made no sense and had been too dificult for students, how was they meant to pick four powerfull phrases out of 3 lines called a paragraph? this exam had no sense and was too hard.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This would be the responsibility of exam boards.
